scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "legacy,api,web" -c "gray,yellow,blue" "npm run dev:legacy" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.test: npm run test:legacy && npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'bin' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'obj' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
